data.news_body: Goa Carbon Limited has informed the Exchange regarding submission of Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditor for quarter ended 30th September 2021 with second page duly scanned and attached.

data.caption: Results-Unaudited Financial Results For 30Th September 2021
data.news_body: Goa Carbon Limited has submitted to the Exchange the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarterly period ended on 30th September 2021 along with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors of the Company that were considered, approved and taken on record by the Board of Directors at their meeting held on 30th October 2021.

data.caption: Board Meeting Outcome for Board Meeting Held On 30Th October 2021
data.news_body: Goa Carbon Limited has informed the Exchange that the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarterly period ended on 30th September 2021 was considered, approved and taken on record by the Board of Directors at their meeting held on 30th October 2021.

data.caption: Results-Unaudited Financial Results For 30Th June 2021
data.news_body: Goa Carbon Limited has submitted to the Exchange the Unaudited Financial Results of the Company for the quarterly period ended on 30th June 2021 along with the Limited Review Report of the Statutory Auditors of the Company that were considered, approved and taken on record by the Board of Directors at their meeting held on 12th August 2021.

data.caption: Disclosure Of Related Party Transactions For The Half Year Ended 31St March 2021
data.news_body: Goa Carbon Limited has informed the Exchange about related Party Transactions for the half year ended 31st March 2021

data.caption: Results-Audited Financial Results For March 31, 2021
data.news_body: Goa Carbon Limited has informed the Exchange about the (1) Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021 (2) Auditors Report for the period ended 31st March 2021 (3) Declaration regarding Audit Report with unmodified opinion.

data.caption: Outcome Of Board Meeting Held On 11.06.2021
data.news_body: Goa Carbon Limited has informed the Exchange about the outcome of the Board Meeting held on 11th June 2021 and about: (1) Audited Financial Results for the quarter and year ended 31st March 2021 (2) Auditors Report for the period ended 31st March 2021 (3) Declaration regarding Audit Report with unmodified opinion.
